Comment: 30,40, 50 are lexical items (idiosyncratic forms). Borrowed from Iranian numerals.
High lexical borrowing from IA, but structure remains of their own.
High lexical borrowing from IA. Very weird mix of IA and Drav lexicon to form complex numerals
High lexical borrowing from IA, but structure remains of their own.
After 4, borrowed from IA, classifire '?a' is borrowed from Oriya/Bengali
After 4, borrowed from Telugu; Subtractive morphology (series of 8 and 9)
Subtractive morphology (series of 8 and 9); parallely for some numerals they use the borrowed IA forms, and also the vigesimal structure.
After 7, this langauge uses IA borrowed forms. Parallely they use both the systems and sometimes mixed.
After 4, borrowed IA numerals are used but in a mixed way.
Loanwords from IA after 4. Some people use Drav. form till 2, rest are IA with Odia classifier 'go??a'.
Highly borrowed from IA. Structure of 30 is interesting.
After 4 borrowed from Telugu; Traditional numerals have various forms of 1-4 on the basis of gender.
After 6, all numerals are borrowed from IA
After 7, all numerals are borrowed from IA.
After 2, full lexical borrowing from IA
After 3, borrowed from IA; numerals from 1-3 shows a distinction between human-masculine, human-feminine and non-human, further borrowed from oriya.
This system is mixed with traditional numerals and loanwords (of IA).
Huge lexical borrowing from IA, therefore two systems co-exist, Decimal (borrowed) and vigesimal (traditional)
Traditional system of Mundari is based on vigesimal (refer SAND data), here the system is borrowed from IA which is decimal
Bororowed from IA.Traditional system was vigesimal.
Bororowed from IA.Traditional system was vigesimal.
Mixture of traditional and borrowed system
Borrowing at lexical level from IA.
Use of connective particle between atom and base.
Use of connective particle between atom and base.
Use of connective particle between atom and base.
Traditional system is Vigesimal, borrowed IA system is Decimal. Both coexists.
Because of borrowing from IA, the system is mixed with decimal-vigesimal. Even crowns (40,60,80) are vigesimal and odd crowns (30,50,70,90) are decimal.
Use of conjunctive marker between atom and base.
Use of conjunctive marker between atom and base.
This system is mixed with Quinary-Decimal.
